title: Nepali Prime Minister Declares 3 Days Of Mourning Following Quake
teaser: Nepal's prime minister declared three days of national mourning after Saturday's earthquake. The death toll could exceed 10,000. For many, the mourning began right after the disaster, but for some families, the search for loved ones continues.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
